name: Cant let go.
description: The video game is about a character named Leslie, Leslie is going through a really rough time because of the breakup between her and her ex boyfriend Alex. In this video game you will need to help Leslie get through everyday activities and decide what you think is best for her. This video game will give you an idea of what SOME people go through during a breakup, they tend to fall in a very dark place and it can be difficult to get back on your feet.
